sentences.sContent: The assignment, delegation or revocation shall be in writing and shall not take effect until copies have been received by both Parties.
sentences.sContent_eng: The assignment, delegation or revocation shall be in writing and shall not take effect until copies have been received by both Parties.
sentences.sCn: 此类委托、授权或撤回应是书面的并且在合同双方接到副本之前不能生效。

trans.tranOther: the act of revoking a law, decision, or agreement
